task2_government_pdfs.title: NOTA TÉCNICA DA COIAB, SOBRE O PL 1331/2022

chunks.text: The PL allows the granting of mining concessions in Indigenous Lands, with FPIC from affected Indigenous communities...
The PL mandates free, prior, and informed consultation... including interpreters if necessary.

chunks.section: Impactos da Mineração em Terras Indígenas: Yanomami
chunks.text: Details the negative impacts of mining, citing a 1,217% increase in mining areas in the Amazon over 35 years.

task2_government_pdfs.title: Mineração em terras indígenas na América Latina

chunks.text: Agência Pública (2020) found 656 mining processes in Indigenous Lands in Amazon Legal. Mining requests rose by 91% in 2019‑2020.
1988 Constitution Art. 231 requires Congressional authorization + consultation. ILO 169 ratified in 2002.
Cadastro Mineiro (ANM) shows ~2,000 blocked requests due to no regulatory framework.
